body: Story 8/10 | Art 10/10 | Character 10/10 | Enjoyment 10/10 | Overall 9.5/10 | Well the story is really good but after realizing its all just an acting not real capture, I'm dissapointed. But still it is a great story. Art is really good with all that sex toys scene. And the character is also accurate, you are "torturing" a Valkryie they won't submit to you after 1 or 2 days. Instead you need to torture them for weeks, because they are trained for this. I really really enjoy the sex toys scene, you can do literally anything and she can't do anything. That feeling is something I like.
